meanings.definition: Having a pointed or projecting edge
meanings.sent1: The cuspy mountain peak looked sharp against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The fence had cuspy spikes to prevent climbing.
meanings.sent3: The cuspy hat made him look like a wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her cuspy wit could cut through any argument.
meanings.sent5: The cuspy icicles glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a sharp or abrupt change
meanings.sent1: The cuspy weather went from sunny to stormy in minutes.
meanings.sent2: His mood swings were cuspy, leaving everyone confused.
meanings.sent3: The cuspy plot twist in the movie shocked the audience.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship had a cuspy start but ended smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The cuspy shift in power caught everyone off guard.

meanings.sent1: The cuspy curve on the graph indicated a possible turning point.
meanings.sent2: The cuspy teeth of the gears allowed for precise movement.
meanings.sent3: The cuspy edge of the puzzle piece fit perfectly into place.
meanings.sent4: Her cuspy predictions were surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent5: The cuspy angle of the roof helped drain rainwater efficiently.
